item.description:
Thinking of Venturing into Short Sales?


Short Sale Expert, Bert Cox, will share:

路 How to work with distressed homeowners facing pre-foreclosure

路 How to negotiate with the bank

路 How to complete a short sale package

路 How to capitalize on short sales in a down market

Bert Cox, Founder of NHREIA, has been doing short sells and selling house fast since 2002 and investing in real estate since 1984. He has a 90%+ success rate and has completed hundreds and hundreds since 2002. In 2009, he completed 71 short sales!

WHEN: 1st Tuesday of Every Month 6:30 PM - Next D.E.N. March 3, 2010 - Enjoy Networking, Deals, Prizes and Fun!!!

WHERE: Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA

WHAT: Networking, Deals Exchange, Featuring:


**Deal or NO DEAL** - Get your deals analyzed by a panel of local real estate experts! To be a candidate to submit your deals - email Bernadette (Bernadette@bostonareia.com) today!

Cost: $25 for visitors, FREE for Members of Boston AREIA

***SAVE THE DATE - BRING YOUR DEALS - BRING LOTS OF BUSINESS CARDS AND COME PREPARED TO NETWORK!***

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: D.E.N. - Deals, Exchange Network, PLUS Short Sale Expert, Bert Cox
